charges.charge_description: 18 USC 924(c)(1)(A)(i) and (B)(ii) POSSESSION/TRADING OF FIREARMS DURING A DRUG OFFENSE (1)

COUNT 1: 18 USC 922(o) and 924(a)(2) Knowingly possess machineguns; COUNT 2: 18 USC 924(c)(1)(A)(i) and (B)(ii) Knowingly possessed and traded firearms during and in relation to a drug trafficking crime, that is, the distribution of methamphetamine, a Schedule II controlled substance; COUNT 3: 18 USC 922(g)(3) and 924(a)(2) Knowingly possess in and affecting commerce, firearms, which had been shipped and transported in interstate commerice; COUNT 4: 18 USC 922(j) and 924(a)(2) Knowingly received, possessed, concealed, stored and bartered in interstate commerce, stolen firearms knowing and having reasonable cause to know that the firearms were stolen
18 USC 924(c)(1)(A)(i) and (B)(ii) POSSESSION/TRADING OF FIREARMS DURING A DRUG OFFENSE (1)

18 USC 922(o) and 924(a)(2) COUNT 1: Knowingly possess machineguns; 18 USC 924(c)(1)(A)(i) and (B)(ii) COUNT 2: Knowingly possessed and traded firearms during and in relation to a drug trafficking crime, that is, the distribution of methamphetamine, a Schedule II controlled substance; 18 USC 922(g)(3) and 924(a)(2) COUNT 3: Knowingly possess in and affecting commerce, firearms, which had been shipped and transported in interstate commerice; 18 USC 922(j) and 924(a)(2) COUNT 4: Knowingly received, possessed, concealed, stored and bartered in interstate commerce, stolen firearms knowing and having reasonable cause to know that the firearms were stolen.
